thread.section_title: Novotel Paris La Defense - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: A pleasant stay
thread.title_full: A pleasant stay - Review of Novotel Paris La Defense, La Defense, France - TripAdvisor

author: Landi N
title: A pleasant stay
text:
Spent 3 nights in this hotel and it was a lovely place , in my opinion.I must say I was worried beforehand, reading the bad reviews on Trip Advisor but my experience was a pleasant stay!
Beds, bathrooms and cleanliness was very good. View from the window was alright and apart from an idiot screaming their head off in our last night at the hotel the overall experience was pleasant.
